entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early this evening and ending before morning then 40 percent chance of flurries. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h early this evening. Temperature steady near minus 8. Wind chill minus 15 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries in the evening then partly cloudy. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h in the evening then light after midnight. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 7 in the evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 20 January 2023
